data.title: Mission Trails Little League
data.text:
Many local employers offer programs designed to support and promote their employee's charitable efforts and donations. Matching Gift Programs allow employers to match monetary donations made by employees to qualifying organizations such as Mission Trails Little League. Better yet, some offer Volunteer Incentive Programs where companies will make a contribution to our league in exchange for volunteer time at MTLL. These valuable, yet vastly under-utilized programs, enable you to double your donation, and even generate monetary contributions in exchange for your volunteer efforts. Please explore these great opportunities to further support our league!

The following is a partial list of the many companies offering Matching Gift Programs and/or Volunteer Incentive Programs. This list may not be complete, so please check with your or your spouse's company on whether they participate in these types of programs. Companies offering these programs have their own internal procedures and forms, typically found in the personnel or human resources department. To process a Matching Gift in support of your donations to MTLL, or a Volunteer Incentive, follow the instructions provided by your employer. Should you require any further documentation from MTLL, please contact us.
